content.text: Hey there! Not much, just excited for the concert this weekend!
Oh cool! I love concerts! Who are you going to see?
I am going to see The Killers! I love their music so much.
Oh nice! I have heard good things about them. What is your favorite song by them?
My favorite song is probably When You Were Young. What about you?
I love that song too! My favorite is probably Mr. Brightside.
That is a good one too! I love the music video for that song.
Me too! It is so cool.
Have you ever seen them live before?
No, I have not. This will be my first time.
Oh man, you are in for a treat! They put on a great show.
Me too! I can't wait to hear them play all of my favorite songs.
Me too! I know it is going to be a great time.
I am sure it will be!
